title: Medical Analysis Laboratory
description: This project involved developing a management system for a medical analysis laboratory. Using Java and the multi-client server concept with threads. The project was a team effort with five members.

title: E-commerce Website for Food
description: This project involved creating an e-commerce website for food products with separate admin and user functionalities. Users can search and purchase food items online.

title: Pharmacy Web Application
description: This project involved creating a web application for a pharmacy as part of the Esperanza Club competition. The app included inventory management. Our team of four won third place.
